Trade/Device Name(s): LZI Oxycodone Drugs of Abuse (DAU) Calibrators
LZI Oxycodone Drugs of Abuse (DAU) Controls
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for LZI Oxycodone Enzyme Immunoassay, calibrators, and controls for qualitative and semi-quantitative detection of oxycodone in urine using automated analyzers.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for qualitative and semi-quantitative determination of oxycodone in human urine at 100 and 300 ng/mL cutoffs with automated clinical chemistry analyzers; for professional use only; calibrators and controls are provided for calibration and quality control.
